long_description: Double up on the striped fun in these SmartWool Double Insignia socks and approach the day in comfort, thanks to cushioned, merino wool construction and supportive braces. WOW(TM) (wool on wool) technology increases wool content in the heel and forefoot area, improving durability and overall comfort. Cushioned construction delivers comfort for all-day wear; buried toe closures reduce chafing and the chance of blisters. Supportive ankle and arch braces add stability and keep socks in place; strategically placed mesh enhances ventilation. SmartWool socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly machine washed and dried without shrinking. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Double up on the striped fun in these SmartWool Double Insignia socks and approach the day in comfort, thanks to cushioned, merino wool construction and supportive braces.
